description.en-US: Window resizer is a utility extension that allows you to resize any browsing window to a list of options or customise the size per your needs. Use this one-click extension for computer browser tab resizes into mobile, desktop & custom sizes and is extremely useful for web page Design.It allows you to configure any website in various sizes. The best window resizer shortcut for Firefox. Resize any current window tab Use existing sizes Add New Size Set direct customised size Rotate tab in vertical or horizontal Easy to use & install This extension adjusts the sizes of the browser tab to emulate various layouts to help web developers & designers to test their sites on different platforms like mobile, desktop, and tablet. Fully customizable extension with add, delete, rotate function, or you can set custom width and height in a simple, accessible way. This way, you won't need to do the window resizing manually. How to use: 1. This extension works on all websites, so visit any domain and open the extension. 2. Click on this static button, and then the window screen resizes according to the width and height that you have selected or set. 3. Click on add button to add customize the size, and you can delete it later. For temporary size, add the width & height, then click “set”. 4. Click on “Rotation” for vertical & horizontal screens. Note: The current tab option is not working on the blank tab (moz-extension://) and also not working on the firefox extension gallery or internal browser pages.

name.es: Cambiar el tamaño de la ventana
name.th: ตัวปรับขนาดหน้าต่าง

summary.ar: Window resizer هو امتداد أداة يتيح لك تغيير حجم أي نافذة تصفح إلى قائمة من الخيارات أو تخصيص الحجم حسب احتياجاتك.
summary.bg: Window resizer е помощно разширение, което ви позволява да преоразмерите всеки прозорец за сърфиране до списък с опции или да персонализирате размера според вашите нужди.
summary.cs: Window resizer je rozšíření nástroje, které vám umožňuje změnit velikost libovolného okna procházení na seznam možností nebo upravit velikost podle vašich potřeb.
summary.da: Window resizer er en hjælpeudvidelse, der giver dig mulighed for at ændre størrelsen på ethvert browservindue til en liste over muligheder eller tilpasse størrelsen efter dine behov.
summary.de: Window Resizer ist eine Dienstprogrammerweiterung, mit der Sie die Größe jedes Browserfensters auf eine Liste von Optionen ändern oder die Größe an Ihre Bedürfnisse anpassen können.
summary.en-US: Window resizer is a utility extension that allows you to resize any browsing window to a list of options or customize the size per your needs.
summary.es: Window resizer es una extensión de utilidad que le permite cambiar el tamaño de cualquier ventana de navegación a una lista de opciones o personalizar el tamaño según sus necesidades.
summary.fi: Ikkunan koon muuttaminen on apuohjelmalaajennus, jonka avulla voit muuttaa minkä tahansa selausikkunan kokoa vaihtoehtoluetteloon tai mukauttaa kokoa tarpeidesi mukaan.
summary.fr: Window resizer est une extension utilitaire qui vous permet de redimensionner n'importe quelle fenêtre de navigation en une liste d'options ou de personnaliser la taille selon vos besoins.
summary.hr: Window Resizer je uslužno proširenje koje vam omogućuje promjenu veličine bilo kojeg prozora pregledavanja na popis opcija ili prilagođavanje veličine prema vašim potrebama.
summary.hu: A Window Resizer egy segédprogram-bővítmény, amely lehetővé teszi bármely böngészőablak átméretezését egy listára, vagy testreszabhatja a méretet az Ön igényei szerint.
summary.id: Pengubah ukuran jendela adalah ekstensi utilitas yang memungkinkan Anda mengubah ukuran jendela penelusuran apa pun ke daftar opsi atau menyesuaikan ukuran sesuai kebutuhan Anda.
summary.it: Window Resizer è un'estensione dell'utilità che consente di ridimensionare qualsiasi finestra di navigazione in un elenco di opzioni o personalizzare le dimensioni in base alle proprie esigenze.
summary.ja: Window resizer は、ブラウジング ウィンドウのサイズをオプションのリストに合わせて変更したり、必要に応じてサイズをカスタマイズしたりできるユーティリティ拡張機能です。
summary.ko: Window resizer는 탐색 창의 크기를 옵션 목록에 맞게 조정하거나 필요에 따라 크기를 사용자 지정할 수 있는 유틸리티 확장 프로그램입니다.
summary.nl: Window resizer is een hulpprogramma-extensie waarmee u het formaat van elk browservenster uit een lijst met opties kunt wijzigen of het formaat naar wens kunt wijzigen.
summary.pl: Window Resizer to rozszerzenie narzędzia, które umożliwia zmianę rozmiaru dowolnego okna przeglądania do listy opcji lub dostosowanie rozmiaru do własnych potrzeb.
summary.ro: Window resizer este o extensie de utilitate care vă permite să redimensionați orice fereastră de navigare la o listă de opțiuni sau să personalizați dimensiunea în funcție de nevoile dvs.
summary.ru: Изменение размера окна это служебное расширение, которое позволяет изменять размер любого окна просмотра до списка параметров или настраивать размер в соответствии с вашими потребностями.
summary.sv-SE: Fönster resizer är ett verktygstillägg som låter dig ändra storlek på valfritt webbläsarfönster till en lista med alternativ eller anpassa storleken efter dina behov.
summary.th: ตัวปรับขนาดหน้าต่าง เป็นส่วนขยายของยูทิลิตี้ที่ให้คุณปรับขนาดหน้าต่างการท่องเว็บให้เป็นรายการตัวเลือกหรือปรับแต่งขนาดตามความต้องการของคุณ.
summary.tr: pencere yeniden boyutlandırıcı, herhangi bir tarama penceresini bir seçenekler listesine göre yeniden boyutlandırmanıza veya boyutunu ihtiyaçlarınıza göre özelleştirmenize izin veren bir yardımcı program uzantısıdır.
summary.zh-CN: 窗口大小调整 是一个实用程序扩展，允许您将任何浏览窗口的大小调整为选项列表或根据需要自定义大小。
